img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(77\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2877%29.png)
From here, the path splits in two different directions. There is a door near the wall where the Father of Stones climbed over, but ignore that for now. Instead, go straight up past it.
img_below_text:
You'll come to a path that slopes down, where you can harvest another **Fire Bellflower** on the left. Once you've collected it, stick to the path that goes up to the right and head for the Turtle Treasure in the distance.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(81\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2881%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

From here, the path splits in two different directions. There is a door near the wall where the Father of Stones climbed over, but ignore that for now. Instead, go straight up past it."
            - Following Text: "You'll come to a path that slopes down, where you can harvest another **Fire Bellflower** on the left. Once you've collected it, stick to the path that goes up to the right and head for the Turtle Treasure in the distance.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(81\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2881%29.png)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie forest path in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The player character is standing at a crossroads, with an arrow indicating the direction to proceed. The highlighted area on the left suggests the location of a collectible item, the **Fire Bellflower**. The narrative instructs the player to ignore the door near the wall and instead follow the path up to the right, leading towards the Turtle Treasure.
